name: Pixel Fish
description:
Pixel Fish is a fast-paced eater game starring a little orange fish named Sam. Sam doesn't know how or why he is in this hostile sea, but he has a strong suspicion that he doesn't belong. His only choice is to eat his way to the top of the food chain and learn the truth..

-Start small and eat other small fish to gain experience and grow, allowing you to eat progressively bigger fish.

-Earn Evolution Points that can be used to purchase permanent upgrades.

-Unlock other playable fish with different traits.

-And of course various achievements. Plus a wishing well where you can toss away your hard earned Evolution Points for a chance at even more power.
